item.title: GPL Hijacking
item.description: LGPL looked like the obvious choice for PCBO when the following problem cropped up - GPL Hijacking. LGPL doesn’t spread to other parts of an application and it does allow being linked with closed-source programs. LGPL is “compatible” with GPL in the sense that you can, at your option, convert a LGPLed program to a GPL one any time you want. Such a change is irreversible. For a small project, this is a risk.
